customers.name: Marcus
customers.demands: I spend most of my days writing by the window, so I'm looking for a contemplative male cat, one with a sleek body and grey fur, who can be both my muse and silent partner.

customers.name: Julia
customers.demands: My yoga studio is a place of zen, and I need an energetic, sociable female cat with soft white fur to share the positive vibes with my clients.

customers.name: Theo
customers.demands: In the studio, it's all about the vibe. I want a chill, fluffy male cat, preferably large, to vibe with the beats. A Maine Coon would be perfect!

customers.name: Angela
customers.demands: The library is my realm of quiet knowledge. I seek a wise-looking, small female cat with short fur, a cat that seems as knowledgeable as the books around her.

customers.name: Darren
customers.demands: I'm looking for a robust, adventurous male cat with a patterned coat to roam around my home kitchen, a true gourmand feline companion.
